stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

 

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Briefly describe one context from 1945 to 1990 that shaped United States participation in world affairs.

  2. Briefly explain how United States policies toward nations in Latin America were similar in one way to United States policies toward nations in Asia from 1945 to 1990.

  3. Briefly explain how United States policies toward nations in Latin America differed in one way from United States policies toward nations in Asia from 1945 to 1990.
